programme.desc: The No. 11 Blue Devils dance with the Cardinals. Duke comes off a 64-49 setback at No. 1 Notre Dame on Feb. 17, while Louisville has won three straight. Both schools are 11-3 in ACC play. Freshman Tajianna Roberts (LOU) averages 13.4 points per game.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 8 Tar Heels face the No. 16 Blue Devils. North Carolina has won seven in a row, and 12 of its past 13, a run that started by beating Duke on Jan. 9. Alyssa Ustby (UNC) averages 12.6 points and 2.4 steals across eight career games versus Duke.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 24 Seminoles (23-6, 13-4 ACC) roll into this finale against the No. 16 Blue Devils (22-7, 13-4). Florida State has won four in a row after scoring an 86-81 upset of No. 3 Notre Dame on Feb. 27. Duke's last win at FSU came in January 2014.
